data.title: Montana State Fair lineup gets comedic with Larry the Cable Guy
data.meta_description: The Montana State Fair has announced that redneck comedy sensation Larry the Cable Guy will join the night show lineup for this year’s state fair.
data.text:
The Montana State Fair has announced that redneck comedy sensation Larry the Cable Guy will join the night show lineup for this year’s state fair.

One of the top comedians in the country, Larry the Cable Guy was part of the Blue Collar Comedy Tour with Jeff Foxworthy and Bill Engvall and is known for the catchphrase “Git-R-Done.”

Larry the Cable Guy takes the stage Friday, Aug. 2, at the Pacific Steel and Recycling Four Seasons Arena during the 2019 Montana State Fair, which runs from July 26 to Aug. 3.

Other acts announced for the fair include country stars Trace Adkins and Tracy Byrd, arena rock tribute band Hairball, classic Motown group The Four Tops and 1990s rock group Collective Soul.

In addition to standup, Larry the Cable Guy has a comedy special with Jeff Foxworthy, which is currently available on Netflix, and has launched his own comedy channel, “Jeff and Larry's Comedy Roundup” on Sirius XM Satellite Radio.

Larry the Cable Guy also has an extensive acting career, with credits that include “Witless Protection,” “Delta Farce” and “Larry the Cable Guy: Health Inspector.”
